statements: SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location, reading_timestamp, reading_value FROM sensors_data;
SELECT * FROM sensors_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_timestamp, reading_value FROM sensors_data ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_value FROM sensors_data GROUP BY sensor_id, sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM sensors_data WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location, reading_timestamp, reading_value FROM sensors_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_timestamp FROM sensors_data WHERE reading_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_timestamp, SUM(reading_value) AS total_value FROM sensors_data GROUP BY sensor_id, reading_timestamp HAVING total_value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_id, reading_timestamp
SELECT * FROM sensors_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_location LIKE '%room%' ORDER BY sensor_id, reading_timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM sensors_data ORDER BY sensor_type ASC
SELECT * FROM SensorsData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, sensor_type FROM SensorsData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorsData WHERE sensor_value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_value ASC;
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) as average_value FROM SensorsData GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) as count FROM Anomalies GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING count > 1;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM SensorsData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SensorsData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(sensor_value) as max_value FROM SensorsData GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT SensorsData.sensor_id, anomaly_description, detected_at FROM Anomalies JOIN SensorsData ON Anomalies.sensor_id = SensorsData.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM SensorsData GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING count > 10 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, sensor_status FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type='Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_status='Active' AND sensor_location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_status = 'Active';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_location LIKE 'Lab%' AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM Anomalies WHERE anomaly_status = 'New' OR anomaly_status = 'Investigating' ORDER BY anomaly_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, data_time FROM sensor_data ORDER BY data_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_location ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT hazard_type, hazard_location, detection_time FROM environmental_hazards WHERE hazard_type = 'Fire';
SELECT sensor_id, data_time, sensor_value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, data_time DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_location WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_location WHERE sensor_id = 3
SELECT sensor_id, detection_time, detection_value FROM anomaly_detection WHERE is_anomaly = TRUE ORDER BY detection_time DESC
SELECT hazard_type, hazard_location, detection_time FROM environmental_hazards ORDER BY detection_time ASC
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_location='Room A';
SELECT reading_id, sensor_id, reading_value FROM Readings WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT notification_id, hazard_type, notification_type FROM Notifications WHERE notification_type='Emergency';
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Room A';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Readings WHERE reading_value >= 50 AND reading_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT anomaly_type, anomaly_description FROM Anomalies INNER JOIN Readings ON Anomalies.reading_id = Readings.reading_id WHERE Readings.reading_value > 100;

SELECT Sensors.sensor_name, Sensors.sensor_location, Notifications.notification_type FROM Sensors INNER JOIN Readings ON Sensors.sensor_id = Readings.sensor_id INNER JOIN Anomalies ON Readings.reading_id = Anomalies.reading_id INNER JOIN Hazards ON Anomalies.anomaly_id = Hazards.anomaly_id INNER JOIN Notifications ON Hazards.hazard_id = Notifications.hazard_id WHERE Sensors.sensor_type = 'Temperature';
